name: Caveman Panic
description:
This is my first game that I'll share :-S

best played with game pad.

d-pad or right stick to move, A button to jump, down to move down a platform, up and jump to go to platforms above.

 WASD and directional keys should also work, Enter to start, space to jump

Collect eggs, stomp dinos and kick them. Escape when you collected 5 eggs.

The game features 6 Levels. 

Created with GM Studio 2. No installation needed. Just download unzip and start.

There is no full screen mode available!
